title: Game Audio Club (January): Music Share
description:
If you’re into making video game music or sound design (or just curious) come hang out with us once a month! Doesn’t matter if you’re a pro or just starting out— everyone’s welcome. Just bring your love for game audio.
We’re a chill group where you can share your work, get feedback, or just vibe with people who love game audio. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312431714
location: MAP St. Louis Montessori School - 3840 Washington Ave - St. Louis, MO, us

title: Game Club: Hollow Knight
description:
Game Club is like a book club except we pick a game to play each month and then meet up to discuss it with a focus on game design.

This month's game is the modern indie classic, Hollow Knight, an epic metroidvania platforming adventure!
This month we'll also be meeting virtually on Discord (in the general voice chat). Come share your thoughts on the game with us! 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312633421

title: Global Game Jam 2026
description:
We are excited to announce Global Game Jam 2026! Come team up with local creators and make a game over the weekend! This event is open to ALL (even remote friends).  Students from any campus are welcome!

Online and In-Person participants are both welcome.  We will be using our community-run Discord server to handle announcements and online participation.  Join here! 

Registration for Global Game Jam is now open!
location: Millennium Student Center, 17 Arnold B Grobman Dr, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA

title: February GameDev Social!
description:
Chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. Our monthly hangout is open to EVERYONE. This is an all ages event, but minors must be accompanied by a parent or guardian. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312692347
location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

title: Share & Play: Game Playtesting
description:
Join us for casual game playtesting! This is an opportunity for developers to share their progress, observe playtesting, and get feedback on their projects, and for local game enthusiasts to get their hands on new games, prototypes, and give helpful feedback.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/312859534
location: St. Louis County Library - Clark Family branch - 1640 South Lindbergh Blvd - St. Louis, MO, us
